title: Skin references (My opinion)
body:
Here are some skins on what I think they referenced or based off from (Might be wrong):
- Toxic Mundo > Hulk (Incredible Hulk)
- Jurassic Cho Gath > Jurassic park
- Star Guardian Lux > Subaru (Houkago no pleiades)
- King Rammus > Bowser (Mario series)
- Chosen Master Yi > Jedi Knights (Star wars)

Well, what other references can you find?


EDIT: A friend of mine just confirmed to me that I am a total idiot (which is true) and that Star guardian Lux is based off Sailor moon. So ignore that above reference.

replies.body:
yes
yes
no
yes
yes.
ninja rammus is a reference to TMNT, pp graves is a reference hugh jackman, augmented singed is probably a reference to bane, big bad warwick is a reference to little red riding hood. there are heaps.

Go to the wiki, look at skins/trivia.

Basically every skin made references something.
